definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: The dormancy of seed of M. robusta is broke if stratified for 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 低溫層積80天即可解除八棱海棠種子休眠。

sentences.english: The second part studies the tissue culture for dormant bud of Acer rubrum L.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分研究了美國紅楓休眠芽組織培養。

sentences.english: Eg: There are many dormant volcanoes in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上有許多休眠的火山。

sentences.english: During dormancy the plants must be kept very dry.
sentences.chinese: 在休眠期，植物必須保持非常乾燥。

sentences.english: Callista again stirred, after so long a slumber.
sentences.chinese: 卡莉斯塔在漫長的休眠後再次警醒。

sentences.english: The seed dormancy polymorphism benefited regulating spatiotemporal distribution of seed germination.
sentences.chinese: 種子休眠的多形性有利於調節種子萌發的時空分佈。

sentences.english: Nonetheless, a large contingent of dormant processes can affect system performance.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，大量休眠的進程仍然會影響系統性能。

sentences.english: It hibernates when nothing is happening, which can extend its life.
sentences.chinese: 當無事發生時，它進行休眠，從而延長使用壽命。

sentences.english: All snoozed alarms are also orphaned.
sentences.chinese: 所有休眠警報都是孤立的。

sentences.english: They may have hibernated or burrowed underground to cope with the difficult environment.
sentences.chinese: 他們也許會休眠或潛入地下來應對艱難的環境。

sentences.english: In the above steps, it is suggested that the existing server software be "made dormant".
sentences.chinese: 在上面的步驟中，我們建議休眠現有的服務器軟件。

sentences.english: If the Suspend and Hibernate options should be allowed in the notification area drop down menu.
sentences.chinese: 在通知區的下拉式選單上應否出現暫停及休眠選項。

sentences.english: Alternating temperatures accelerated corm dormancy releasing, but there was obvious difference between the two cultivars.
sentences.chinese: 變溫處理加速球莖休眠的解除，但品種間有較大差異。

sentences.english: On a routine inspection I discovered a dormant domiciliary account with a BAL.
sentences.chinese: 在定期檢查我發現了與BAL的一個休眠住所的帳戶。

definition: to wait for an opportunity/(electronic devices) standby
